ind_ben_technika: Required Special Equipment and Packing Materials
benefits_p: We are operators of warehouse spaces of various sizes, as well as owners of buildings where these warehouses are located. Therefore, you don't need to worry about security, we have the experience and established infrastructure.
about_p_1: Here, you rent a warm, dry, and clean space from 1 to 10 m² with security, video surveillance, and 24/7 access. Do you need to clear out a basement, attic, or balcony from things you rarely use?
about_p_2: We will solve your problems. Forget about space limitations and focus only on your business, leaving the important task of storing your property to us.
calc_p: We offer mini warehouses of various sizes. To better understand which size warehouse you need, please use the calculator
ind_calc_auto: By selecting the vehicle you will use to bring your items, the system will suggest the appropriate warehouse size
ind_calc_size: Or directly choose the warehouse size you are interested in
modal_p: Our manager will contact you to confirm your reservation
